original_text: Wherefore the Lord said, Forasmuch as this people draw near me with their mouth, and with their lips do honour me, but have removed their heart far from me, and their fear toward me is taught by the precept of men:
korean_text: 주께서 이르시되 이 백성이 입으로는 나를 가까이 하며 입술로는 나를 공경하나 그들의 마음은 내게서 멀리 떠났나니 그들이 나를 경외함은 사람의 계명으로 가르침을 받았을 뿐이라

sentences.original_text: Forasmuch as this people draw near me with their mouth
and with their lips do honour me
but have removed their heart far from me
and their fear toward me is taught by the precept of men
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나를 경외하는 것은 사람의 계명으로 가르침을 받았음이라
